Room.Name: Tower Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are On Tower Lane, north of the Kista Library.
Room.LongDescription: The citizens of Kista are very proud of their library, as it is known throughout the land as the depository of all knowledge. Actually, many of the books owned by the Kista Library are on loan to the library in Oceancrest, but the rarest books have never left this building. Pearl Avenue is to the east.
